column5: hi guys.i will be at holland river(bradford) tomorrow for the first time! i just need to know how deep is the water there? What should I expect to catch and what bait and tackle should I use? Thanks in advance

Brace yourself for the massive crowds get there early! Water is muddy and deep fairly shallow for the most part no deeper then 10 ft I beleive but you can expect to catch crappie perch, if you use a float with a tube or minnow under it. You can also catch sucker, carp and bullheads if using a sinker and worm. Good Luck!
great info thanks! i guess i should be out before 6 AM!
never fished there so I can't give you any tips, but I can wish you good luck!        Good luck
They are right, there WILL BE HUGE crowds this weekend the way this summer weather is.  I was there just yesterday, and think it still early.  jig and float is the way to go!!!!
